mapper.select: SELECT TSAT.ID, TSAT.NAME as USER_NAME, TSBT.COMPANY, TSAT.AFFILIATES_CODE, TSUTIT.START_DATE, TSUTIT.EXPIRATION_DATE, DATEDIFF(TSUTIT.EXPIRATION_DATE, NOW()) AS REMAINING_DAYS, TSPTT.NAME as PAY_TYPE_NAME FROM TTB_SMART_ACCESS_TB TSAT JOIN TTB_SMART_BIZ_TB TSBT ON TSBT.SEQ = TSAT.BIZ_SEQ JOIN TTB_SMART_USER_TICKETS_INFO_TB TSUTIT ON TSUTIT.ACCESS_SEQ = TSAT.SEQ JOIN TTB_SMART_PAY_TYPE_TB TSPTT ON TSPTT.CODE = TSUTIT.PAY_TYPE_CODE WHERE TSAT.ID = #{id} AND TSAT.AFFILIATES_CODE = #{affiliates_code}
